sentence: We also spend time exploring a trio of different stories out of North Carolinaone concerning Madison Cawthorn, one about redistricting, and one, believe it or not, about Vladimir Putinand bring you up to speed on the just-concluded presidential election in South Korea.

sentence: Chuck Edwards for Congress, Instagram.? Ad by ad, North Carolina state Sen. Chuck Edwards (R) has gotten more direct and sarcastic with his mockery of Rep. Madison Cawthorn (R-N.C.).

sentence: Republican Rep. Madison Cawthorn simply cannot keep it together right now.
